name: Weitzenböck Torsion Rank Invariant
statement\_igsoa: For teleparallel BoxGeometryStates, torsion rank(T\_δᵂ) is invariant under any δ / λᶜᵘʳᵛ evolution compatible with Ω.
statement\_standard: Teleparallel torsion rank is topological; it cannot change without a discrete structural event.
sketch: 1. Model torsion as a tensor-valued 2-form with rank r.
2. Show δ / λᶜᵘʳᵛ transformations act as automorphisms preserving rank.
3. Conclude rank invariance under Ω-constrained evolution.
